## Config.updateSystemConfigurationQualifierDefaultValues() function

Creates a copy of the provided [system configuration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md) with updated qualifier default values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function updateSystemConfigurationQualifierDefaultValues(config: ISystemConfiguration, qualifierDefaultValues: Record<string, string | null>): Result<ISystemConfiguration>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

config


</td><td>

[ISystemConfiguration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md)


</td><td>

The base [system configuration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md) to copy.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

qualifierDefaultValues


</td><td>

Record&lt;string, string \| null&gt;


</td><td>

Map of qualifier names to default values. Use `null` to remove existing values.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ISystemConfiguration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the updated [system configuration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md) if successful, `Failure` with an error message otherwise.
